description: Talk to the King Narnode to start the quest.

2.step: Go the Gnome pilot and travel to Gandius.

description: Select the glider when clicking on Captain Errdo.
Select Gandius on the glider interface.

3.step: Go inside the Shipyard and talk to GLO Caranock.

description: If you do not have monkey bones kill a monkey for one.
You will be stopped, finish the conversation to get into the Shipyard.
Talk to GLO Caranock.
Talk to the King Narnode.
Talk to Daero twice.

6.step: Talk to Daero at the hangar.

description: Talk to Daero again once you arrive at the hangar.
Operate the Reinitialisation Panel.
Puzzle Solution.
Step 1 (First row): Align all the 5 pieces outlined in the picture. Then rotate the pieces at the end clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the first row.
Step 2 (Second row): Align all the 5 pieces outlined in the picture. Then rotate the pieces at the end clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the second row.
Step 3 (Third row): Align all the 5 pieces outlined in the picture. Then rotate the pieces at the end clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the third row.
Step 4 (First column): Align both pieces outlined in the picture. Then rotate the pieces clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the first column of the last two rows.
Step 3 (Second column): Align both pieces outlined in the picture. Then rotate the pieces clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the second column of the last two rows.
Step 3 (Third column): Align both pieces outlined in the picture. Then rotate the pieces clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the third column of the last two rows.
Step 3 (Fourth-Fifth column): Rotate the pieces clockwise or counter-clockwise to solve the puzzle.
Talk to Daero.
Talk to Waydar to fly to Crash Island.
Talk to Lumbo.
Talk to Waydar twice.

12.step: Talk to Lumbo to sail to Ape Atoll.

description: Talk to Lumbo.
Run into the monkey archers. (Warning: You will take a lot of damage and poisoned in this part. Use Protect from Range to avoid any damage)

14.step: Pick-lock the prison door and run past the Monkey Guards.

description: BEWARE: If you stand next to the fence while a Monkey Guard is walking past your cell, you will take damage! Pick-lock the prison door.
Run past the Monkey Guards. Avoid getting to close to the Monkey Guards or you will take damage and sent back in jail.
Follow the path to Garkor. You must stay close to tall grass to avoid getting escorted back to prison following the path exactly will prevent this from happening! Finally, talk to Garkor.
Follow the path exactly to avoid getting escorted to jail, then search crate for monkey dentures. (Beware: Only stand on the dark brown ground [in the shade] or you will be sent to jail.
Search the crate M'ammmy Mould.

18.step: Search this crate for M'ammmy Mould (shown below). (Chat: 1)

description: Search the same crate as in the picture to get a M'ammmy Mould.
Teleport out to gear and grab food for this next part since you will be encountering a lot of monsters. Select the 'Travel' option on Daero to get back to the Hangar.
Select the 'Travel' option on Waydar to get back to Crash Island.
Select the 'Travel' option on Lumdo to get back to Ape Atoll.
Climb down the bamboo ladder to get into Ape Atoll Dungeon.
Follow the path to Zooknock (Note: Using Protect from Melee will prevent taking a lot more damage).

20.step: Use the gold bar, monkey dentures, and M'ammy mould on Zooknock to get an enchanted bar.

description: Use the gold bar on Zooknock.
Use the monkey dentures on Zooknock.
Use the M'ammy mould on Zooknock to get an enchanted bar.

21.step: Use the enchanted bar on the Wall of Flame and a ball of wool on it to get a M'Speak Amulet.
21.subtitle: Monkey Talismen

description: Go upstairs to avoid the Monkey Guards from getting in your way.
Climb down the bamboo ladder to be next to the trapdoor surrounded by Monkey Guards.
Climb-down the trapdoor to get into the Temple Basement (Note: If you do not have Protect from Melee prepare to take a lot of damage from Monkey Zombies).
Use the Enchanted bar on the Wall of Flame, then use the ball of wool on it to get a M'Speak Amulet.

22.step: Talk the monkey child three times and give him 5 bananas to get the talismen. (Chat: 4-2)

description: Get 5 Bananas from the Banana Tree.

Equip the M'speak amulet and talk the monkey child three times with 5 bananas in your inventory (Note: Avoid getting seen by the Monkey's Aunt. Then after the third time talking to the monkey child wait until the Auntie does one more lap around to get the talismen from the monkey child.

23.step: Use monkey bones and monkey talismen on Zooknock to get Monkey talismen.

description: Use monkey bones on Zooknock.
Use monkey talismen on Zooknock to get Monkey greegree.

24.step: Go to Ardy Zoo, transform into a monkey, and talk to Monkey minder.
24.subtitle: Chapter 3: Monkey Rescue Mission

description: Go to Ardy Zoo, equip the monkey greegree to transform into a monkey, and talk to Monkey minder.

25.step: Talk to a monkey with the 'Talk' option.

description: Talk to a monkey with the 'Talk' option.

26.step: Transform into a human and talk to the Monkey minder again.

description: Transform into a human and talk to the Monkey minder again to escape the monkey habitat.

27.step: You must walk back to the Gnome Stronghold, then back to Ape Atoll.

description: You must walk back to the Gnome Stronghold then back to Ape Atoll. (Beware: Teleporting at all will cause the monkey in your inventory to disappear).
When you arrive to Ape Atoll equip the monkey greegree to turn into a monkey to avoid getting attacked at all.
Open the Bamboo Gate while transformed being a monkey.
Talk to Garkor.
Talk to the Elder Guard.
Climb up, cross the bridge and down the ladders to get across.
Climb down the ladders to get across.
Talk to Kruk.

31.step: Talk to the King Awowogie twice.

description: Talk to the King Awowogie twice.
Talk to the Elder Guard to leave.

33.step: Talk to Garkor twice to get a sigil.
33.subtitle: Chapter 4: Jungle Demon

description: Talk to Garkor twice to get a sigil.

34.step: Wear sigil to teleport to the Jungle Demon. (Chat: 1)

description: Wear sigil to teleport to the Demon.
Run away into the sides so the gnomes weaken the Jungle Demon. You must get the last hit to defeat the Jungle Demon or he will keep regenerating health.
Run north to avoid the gnome from getting the last hit and defeat the Jungle Demon (level 195).
Talk to Garkor.
Talk to Zooknock to return to Ape Atoll.
Talk to the King.

40.step: Talk to Daero to receive melee experience.

description: Talk to Daero to receive melee experience. Choosing 'Focus on increasing strength and stamina...' gives the following: 35k Strength, 35k Hitpoints, 20k Attack, 20k Defence. Choosing 'Focus on increasing attack and defence techniques...' gives the following: 35k Attack, 35k Defence, 20k Strength, and 20k Hitpoints.
